publis.title: Masters Thesis: Migration Dynamics in Brazil
publis.full_title: Migration Dynamics in Brazil: A Spatial Econometric Analysis
publis.excerpt: My Master's thesis on migration dynamics in Brazil and abroad, with an emphasis on the economic factors that drive people to relocate.

publis.title: Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil
publis.full_title: Higher Education, Economic Complexity, and Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil: A Geographically Weighted Regression Approach
publis.excerpt: Meet Wilhelm, your AI Econometrics Professor! This digital book provides comprehensive econometrics lessons, enhanced by an interactive AI agent designed to guide you through complex concepts and help you learn.

publis.title: Export complexity, industrial complexity and regional economic growth in Brazil
publis.excerpt: A comparison of various complexity (ECI) metrics with Brazilian exports and employment data.

publis.full_title: Human Capital, Knowledge Spillovers, and Economic Complexity: A Econometric Analysis through Global and Local methos in Brazilian Micorregions
publis.excerpt: My Bachelor thesis on human capital, knowledge spillovers, and economic complexity in Brazilian microregions.

publis.title: Socioeconomic Observatory of Santa Catarina
publis.excerpt: A dashboard to analyze and forecast time series of Brazilian socio-economic data, with focus on the state of Santa Catarina.

agents.title: Tom Riddle's Diary
agents.excerpt: A tutorial on visualizing geospatial data using the Leaflet JavaScript library.
agents.content: This post dives into using Leaflet to create interactive maps for geospatial data visualization. Topics include setting up a Leaflet map, adding markers, layers, and popups, and integrating with geospatial datasets. The tutorial includes a step-by-step guide to building a city temperature heatmap.

layers.title: Cities I have Lived In
layers.excerpt: A Geographic visualization about the cities I have lived before.
layers.desc1_floripa: Where I have lived most of my life, where I grow up and started working.
layers.desc2_floripa: Florianópolis is a city in southern Brazil known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and outdoor activities. It's a popular destination for both tourists and locals.
layers.desc1_dublin: Where I have matured, spent one year in the island studying business administration and English langugage to prepare myself for the challenges to come.
layers.desc2_dublin: Dublin is the capital of Ireland, famous for its rich history, literary heritage, and friendly atmosphere. It's a hub for technology and finance in Europe.
layers.desc1_lisbon: Where I continued working in IT and got back in touch with my roots, keep good memories from this place :)
layers.desc2_lisbon: Lisbon is the capital of Portugal, known for its stunning architecture, historic neighborhoods, and vibrant nightlife. It's a city that blends tradition with modernity.
layers.desc1_munster: Where I did my Masters and aim to persue a Senior carrer.
layers.desc2_munster: Münster is a city in Germany known for its historic old town, university, and cycling culture. It's a charming city with a rich history and vibrant student life.

layers.title: Brazilian Road Network
layers.excerpt: A spatial visualization of the brazilian road network through OpenLayer mapping.

layers.title: Hiroshima-Nagasaki
layers.excerpt: A spatial demonstration of the Hiroshima and Nagasaki atomic bombings, visualizing the impact zones and historical context.

layers.title: Ecosystems of the World
layers.excerpt: Get to explore the ecosystems of the world, from deserts to rainforests, and understand their unique characteristics and biodiversity.

layers.title: Timezones
layers.excerpt: Explore the timezones of the world with this interactive map. Understand how time is divided across different regions and how it affects daily life.

layers.title: World Cities Population
layers.excerpt: Explore cities around the world and their population size. This interactive map visualizes the population distribution in major cities, helping you understand urbanization patterns.

layers.title: Sea Level Simulator
layers.excerpt: Simulate sea level rise and its impact on coastal areas. This interactive map allows users to visualize how different levels of sea rise would affect regions around the world.

layers.title: Solar Terminator
layers.excerpt: The solar terminator shows the moving line dividing Earth's day and night sides as it rotates.

layers.title: Map Projection Review

blogs.label: Blogs
blogs.title: Blogs
blogs.description: Thoughts and tutorials on development and geospatial tech.

posts.title: Notes on the Census Microdata
posts.excerpt: With his Census background, Guilherme illustrates a streamlined method for accessing IBGE's census data via Bash and GCP.

posts.title: Geographic Normalization
posts.excerpt: Geographic Normalization can transform complex, irregular polygons into standardized hexagonal grids, and understand the far-reaching implications of this approach for spatial analysis.

posts.title: Money Neutrality in the Covid19 Era
posts.excerpt: Based on economic models, the idea of money neutrality is explained in an animated way. Guilherme rightly predicts inflation in the medium term, as expansionary monetary policies were applied to mitigate the Covid effects. In the long term, 'inflation is nothing but a monetary phenomenon'.

posts.title: Immigration in Metropolitan Lisbon
posts.full_title: Immigration in metropolitan Lisbon: A Geospatial Analysis of the 2021 Census
posts.excerpt: A spatial data analysis of the 2021 Portuguese Census of metropolitan Lisbon.

posts.title: Secrets in the Cloud
posts.full_title: Secrets in the Cloud: Self-Hosting VaultWarden on GCP with Cloud Run and Terraform
posts.excerpt: (WORK IN PROGRESS) A tutorial on how to self-host VaultWarden, a secure password manager, on Google Cloud Platform using Cloud Run and Terraform.

about.label: About
about.title: Guilherme Viegas
about.tagline: Data Scientist | Geospatial Analyst | AI Enthusiast
about.description: I transform complex data into actionable insights through advanced analytics and machine learning. With expertise in econometrics and spatial analysis, I build solutions that help organizations make data-driven decisions. My approach combines technical rigor with clear communication to bridge the gap between data science and business strategy.

sections.title: Methodological Approach
sections.content: My work follows a rigorous analytical process: 1) Problem framing with stakeholders, 2) Exploratory data analysis, 3) Model development with validation, 4) Implementation strategy, and 5) Continuous monitoring. I emphasize reproducibility through version control and documentation, ensuring insights stand up to scrutiny.
